title: AI model accurately predicts need for skilled nursing after hospital discharge
description: An artificial intelligence (AI) tool accurately predicted which patients would need a skilled nursing facility after leaving the hospital, a new study shows.
content:
An artificial intelligence (AI) tool accurately predicted which patients would need a skilled nursing facility after leaving the hospital, a new study shows.

title: Why ET AI Conclave & Awards 2025 is the strategic event India’s AI builders cannot ignore
description: The ET AI Conclave and Awards in Bengaluru have become one of Indias most important crossroads for artificial intelligence innovation, leadership, and strategic dialogue. For founders, CXOs, policymakers, and investors focused on building AI solutions that deliver measurable results, missing this event means losing access to critical insights, relationships, and credibility. The awards spotlight excellence that matters and the conclave drives meaningful conversations on governance, adoption, and real world impact in AI.
content:

title: Samsung logs best-ever profit on AI chip demand
description: Samsung Electronics posted record quarterly profits Thursday, riding massive market demand for the memory chips that power artificial intelligence.
content:

title: From OpenAI to ‘WAGA’: Why tech billionaires Elon Musk and Vinod Khosla have been feuding since 2024
description: While race and politics dominate the latest exchange, the deeper roots of the Musk-Khosla rivalry lie in artificial intelligence.

content:

title: Meta Forecasts Spending of at Least $115 Billion This Year
description: The Facebook parent signals an all-in push on artificial intelligence, pouring unprecedented billions into data centres and talent while scaling back its metaverse ambitions to stay ahead in the global AI race.
content: Meta’s core business of online advertising continued to grow, providing cash for its AI spending. For the fourth quarter, revenue was $59.89 billion, up 24% from a year earlier. Profit was $22.76 billion, up 9.2%. The company attributed the growth to... [4467 chars]

title: Microsoft shares slide as AI spending surges
description: Microsoft on Wednesday reported a 60 percent jump in net income for the last quarter of 2025, but spending on artificial intelligence surged, rattling investors.
content:

description: An Oakland County man accused of making pornagraphy generated by artificial intelligence of a social media influencer has pleaded guilty to cyberstalking.
content:

title: O-lab Inc, OZARU, and HackÜ: Latin American EdTech ventures, winners of TecPrize
description: The award recognizes solutions that work to close workforce skills gaps in Latin America through the use of artificial intelligence (AI).The 10 finalist ventures presented their proposals within the framework of the IFE Conference 2026.The EdTech ecosystem of the Institute for the Future of Education of the Tecnológico de Monterrey Education Group guarantees support and mentorship. MONTERREY and NUEVO LEÓN, Mexico, Jan. 28, 2026 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Within the framework of the IFE Conference 2026, the Institute for the Future of Education (IFE) of the Tecnológico de Monterrey Education Group announced O-lab Inc, OZARU, and HackÜ as the winning ventures of TecPrize 2025. The winning solutions work to close workforce skills gaps in Latin America through the use of artificial intelligence (AI).
content:
The award recognizes solutions that work to close workforce skills gaps in Latin America through the use of artificial intelligence (AI).
The 10 finalist ventures presented their proposals within the framework of the IFE Conference 2026.

title: Elon Musk’s Tesla reports first-ever annual decline in revenue
description: Electric car company to invest $2bn in artificial intelligence start-up as part of pivot away from auto market.
content:
